name: The Fighting Temeraire
description:
A short cannon-style game based around the famous Turner painting, "The Fighting Temeraire" - the old warship is being taken to be broken down, and is reliving it's old memories by fighting the ghosts of enemy ships.

The game is pretty basic as of now, but I plan on adding more polish (Sound/VFX, cutscenes for the Start/End, improving the art overall) in the future, if only for my own practice.

You can download the .zip or play in WebGL mode.

Use the arrow keys to aim, and the spacebar to fire your cannon.
